title: Crispy puy lentil, peach & Parma ham salad

ingredients.item: 250g pack Ready To Eat Merchant Gourmet Puy Lentils
½ x 83g pack Italian Parma ham
¼ x 25g pack basil, leaves picked

instructions.step: Heat 2 tbsp oil and the garlic in a large frying pan over a medium-high heat. Add the lentils and fry for about 8 minutes, stirring regularly until the lentils are crisp in places. Set aside to cool for 5 minutes.

Halve and finely slice the peach; toss with the lentils, along with any peach juice from the chopping board. Divide between 2 plates along with the Parma ham and basil leaves. Drizzle over the remaining ½ tbsp oil and the balsamic vinegar; scatter with the cheese and grind over some black pepper to serve.
